Bsp_PlatformSetPllFreq Struct Reference
Platform Specific API

Set Pixel Clock Freq of the Video PLL's. More...

#include <bsp_platform.h>

Data Fields

UInt32 videoPll
 
UInt32 pixelClk
 
UInt32 chooseMaxorMinMN
 

Detailed Description

Set Pixel Clock Freq of the Video PLL's.

Field Documentation

UInt32 Bsp_PlatformSetPllFreq::chooseMaxorMinMN

Decides whether the value of M and N programmed to the PLL is maximum or minimum. Program BSP_PLATFORM_VIDEO_PLL_CALC_MIN_MN for minimum and BSP_PLATFORM_VIDEO_PLL_CALC_MAX_MN for maximum.

UInt32 Bsp_PlatformSetPllFreq::pixelClk

Frequency of pixelClk outpur of PLL. Expected to specify in KHz.

UInt32 Bsp_PlatformSetPllFreq::videoPll

Video PLL, whcih needs to be programmed. See Bsp_PlatformPll for all possible values.
